DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective prospective design study , include hospital 1:1 assign two group : ①Interventional hospital , receive 3-month medical education ; ②Non-interventional hospital , receive 3-month medical education . During 1 month education , electronic record outpatient inpatient visit include rheumatologist collect data test evaluation result spondyloarthritis ( SpA ) patient diagnose accord new Assessment Spondylo-Arthritis International Society ( ASAS ) criterion collect outpatient electronic record inpatient medical chart ; 3 month education , data collect compare data education , impact medical education physician behaviour analyze . Meanwhile , understand acceptance level evaluate questionnaire , difference education impact education physician cognition evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Interventional hospital select base follow criterion : 1. complete outpatient inpatient electronic record ; 2. 50 % registrar and/or consultant department participate professional education event ; 3. department head willing participate clinical audit provide information outpatient inpatient record data collection ; 4. except rheumatic disease clearly diagnose . Noninterventional hospital select base follow criterion : 1. complete outpatient inpatient electronic record ; 2. professional education event cover ; 3. department head willing participate clinical audit provide information outpatient inpatient record data collection ; 4. except rheumatic disease clearly diagnose .
